short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Add CCN iCatalogues to your Google search

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The CCN iCatalogue Search App renders construction-industry specific catalogue results based on your search term in an unobtrusive way and does not affect the Google search in any way. The catalogues are from construction suppliers based in South Africa and are available to view and download for free on the CCN Portal at www.ccnportal.co.za
